title: Special Resident Package
seo_title: Special Resident Package | WestHouse Hotel New York
seo_description: Pamper your pet in true WestHouse style! We are delighted to welcome our “Special Residents” with a comfortable bed and bowl, a welcome basket of plush toys and delectable treats from local New York vendors, and dog walking services through a professional pet concierge in nearby iconic Central Park.
contents: Pamper your pet in true WestHouse style!
